    AC: Dodge Viper GT3-R 2012

    The Dodge Viper evolved into its 3rd generation model at the 2012 New York Motor Show. With the appearance of this iconic American sports car, the development of a GTS-R competition model was also announced, and it became clear that the Viper would return once again to the Le Mans 24 hour race and American Le Mans series after a 10-year hiatus.
